original_text: After Rehoboam’s position as king was established and he had become strong, he and all Israel with him abandoned the law of the Lord.
korean_text: 르호보암의 나라가 견고하고 세력이 강해지매 그가 여호와의 율법을 버리니 온 이스라엘이 본받은지라

sentences.original_text: After Rehoboam's position as king was established
he and all Israel with him
abandoned the law of the Lord
